text: Rob Morgan (born February 24, 1973) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Turk Barrett in all six of Marvel's Netflix television series and Hap Jackson in Mudbound. He also played Officer Powell in Stranger Things and Herbert Richardson in Just Mercy. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors
title: Rob Morgan (actor)
